TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CosmosDBSqlContainerThroughputSettingResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a CosmosDBSqlContainerThroughputSetting along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetCosmosDBSqlContainerThroughputSettingResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetCosmosDBSqlContainerThroughputSetting method.
